name: PHPickerViewController
desc: A view controller that provides the user interface for choosing assets from the photo library.

items.name: init(configuration: PHPickerConfiguration)
items.desc: Creates a new picker view controller with the configuration you specify.

items.name: struct PHPickerConfiguration
items.desc: An object that contains information about how to configure a picker view controller.

items.name: var configuration: PHPickerConfiguration
items.desc: The configuration you specify when creating the picker.

items.name: protocol PHPickerViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: A protocol the picker uses to communicate user selections.

items.name: struct PHPickerResult
items.desc: Types that represent a selected asset from the user’s photo library.
